name: City - Pixel Prototype Week 9
description:
Controls:

Mouse and Left Click to select options

Made in one week in Bennett Foddy's Pixel Prototype Studio class at NYU.

This week's assignment: make a game based off of box art with the title removed. This was the cover I got:  So I made a city builder that was influenced by the ongoing housing/job crisis going on in the Bay Area.

Read more about the development here.
